entries.name: patterns/idioms
entries.content:
# OCaml Idioms

## Prefer pattern matching

Use pattern matching for algebraic data types.

## Use immutable data

Favor immutability in core logic.

entries.name: formatters/overview
entries.content:
# OCaml Formatters

ocamlformat is the standard formatter.

See: https://github.com/ocaml-ppx/ocamlformat

entries.name: spec
entries.content:
# OCaml Manual
Version: unknown

Source: https://ocaml.org/manual/


See: https://ocaml.org/manual/

entries.name: linters/overview
entries.content:
# OCaml Linters

A common linter is ocamlformat (formatting) and odoclint.

See:
- https://github.com/ocaml-ppx/ocamlformat
- https://github.com/ocaml/odoc
